application.doc: Retrieving information about all valid support files

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve information about all valid support files
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the Support URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: 200 OK Content-Type:application/json [ { "comment" : "My support file", "filename" : "iswga_8.0.0.0_20130513-032905.707994_iswga.support", "id" : "950e094e8ac2ab548fe77e87eecacd46", "index" : 0 }, { "comment" : "My other support file", "filename" : "iswga_8.0.0.0_20130513-032855.520764_iswga.support", "id" : "d057ae5cd5aa96580a4e7e2065fbe7bf", "index" : 1 } ]

representation.name: supportFileInformation
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: index
param.doc: The index of the support file in the array of support files. Note that this array is zero based

param.name: id
param.doc: An SHA-256 hash of the support file's filename

param.name: comment
param.doc: The comment associated with the support file

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
